Reviews.Title: “Pass this motel up”
Reviews.Author: vlhazen
Reviews.Content: Management was polite. The motel is a dump. Noisy, carpet in the room is old and smells. Carpet outside on the deck is worn and torn in places. The room there wasn't even kleenex's. The continental breakfast consisted of cold ceral and coffee was cold. I booked through Hotelsone website and when I got there to check in they didn't even have my reservation. It took over an hour and 3 phone calls by me to get my reservation straightened out. I won't stay here again or use Hotelsone again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice for the price!”
Reviews.Author: JennyC1
Reviews.Content: My family stayed here for two nights while visiting Branson, particularly Silver Dollar City. The location was perfect, a very short, no traffic drive to SDC. There is a McDonalds and a Pizza Hut right next door. The motel itself is dated, not new and flashy but seriously for $39.00 a night what on earth could you find to complain about? Rooms were clean, bathroom was clean and everything worked fine. TV reception was good with lots of channel choices. Is this a 5 star resort... of course not! Is it clean and comfortable, yes it is. Pillows were a bit on the flat side, take your own. Never tried the breakfast ...went to McDonalds and it was fine. I don't know what kind of breakfast people expect when the room cost is less than $50 in a tourist trap like Branson.....I don't know how they can even meet expenses at this price. If you want a clean room for a good price then stay here!! We NEVER had a traffic problem until we got into Branson on 76, the location of this Inn makes it a lot easier to get around the mobs!!

Reviews.Title: “Think twice”
Reviews.Author: BradleyEudora
Reviews.Content: We stayed two nights. The beds were comfortable and plenty of towels. It is under new ownership and the breakfast room was closed down. Breakfast served in the lobby. Verry small. Only cereal and toast, coffee and watered down juice. They used to serve biscuits and gravy. Will think twice before we stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: jenn123456
Reviews.Content: We paid for two nights and stayed only one. On the second night we were woke up in the middle of the night from a man screaming help me!!! We called the front desk and they said they would take care of it. After ten minutes of screaming our two babies had been woken up. We try to leave but the five police cars and ems vechiles were everywhere! A man was laying on the ground screaming and the window was shattered in the room behind ours!!!!!!!! The police told us that they had been doing drugs!!!!!!! Management told me that it was impossable to be refunded! And we should just go back to sleep that it was just a man that was sick!!! Stay here at your own risk!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Will not stay again”
Reviews.Author: alicialstewart101979
Reviews.Content: The place was pretty clean. The only issue I had was there wasn't a coffee maker. They do have a hair dryer but you have to go to the front desk and ask for one. The breakfast was only cereal. They are in the middle of ownership change and there breakfast room was tore down. The pool was down.

Reviews.Title: “Good bargain”
Reviews.Author: weebes
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Lakeview Inn from July 8 through the 11th. This is the fifth year that we have stayed there. It is a great bargain for the price. The room is very bare bones - two beds, a 19 inch tv, a small table and a dresser. They do not give out any toiletries except a very small bar of soap. However, the room is very clean. The pool is very clean. It sits a few miles from Silver Dollar City. It sits right next to a dollar general store as well as a small grocery store. It is about two miles from a super Walmart. It does take about 20 minutes to drive into Branson but it is a beautiful view. It sits behind a pizza hut and a mcdonalds so you can walk to get some food. You have access to a coin operated washer and dryer but it costs 2 dollars per load for both the washer and dryer. There is a laundry almost across the street if you want to save money. The people who run the Inn are very helpful and friendly. They do provide a breakfast in the morning - biscuits and gravy, toaster waffles, toast and cereal as well as juice and coffee. Can be a cost saver it you have a large family. Overall I have been very pleased with the place. Paid 50 dollars a night but expedia usually has a deal in July where you can either get one night free with two paid nights or a 50 dollar gas card with three paid nights. You can't beat the value.

Reviews.Title: “DISGUSTING”
Reviews.Author: johns0687
Reviews.Content: I wasn't expecting much for $53/night but this hotel was the grossest place I had ever stayed. The day my sister and I stayed there it was almost 100 degrees and our air conditioner hadn't been turned on prior to our arrival. It took until we checked out for the room to actually get cold. The door had 3 locks on it if that tells you anything. The desk man didn't ask for ID for me or my sister when we checked in. For all he knew, he could have been giving a room to teenagers. He refereed to us as "the last of his children to get in for the night ..." creepy!! The room had a terrible smell and the comforter was disgusting. The water pressure in the shower was pitiful.

Reviews.Title: “good value for $30 a night”
Reviews.Author: rogyord
Reviews.Content: spent 3 nights there,,,good budget motel,,,the only thing that was annoying was the small 3 table breakfast room everything else was ok...nothing fantasic...if your cheap this is the place...........

Reviews.Title: “Worth the price”
Reviews.Author: loves2travel1959
Reviews.Content: Will stay @ the Lakeview Inn again!! We had a very unpleasant experience in Eureka Springs but arriving @ Lakeview was much better!!! Shawn was more than helpful with information about town, breakfast, anything we needed. The refrigerator wasn't working and after a few hours almost the time for him to leave he was able to locate another one and replace ours. The breakfast was ok, nothing special. A mix for the gravy and waffles that look like they are bought in bulk. Would have preferred a muffin or english muffin, bagel or something besides bread. The rooms were cleaned and restocked daily. The only problem I had was someone had cleaned the room while we were gone and it smelled of cigarettes!! Yuck!! Didn't like the location of the pool. The people above us was always up @ the butt crack of dawn and you could every time they would walk!!! But really all in all it wasn't a bad stay and we would stay there again. It's convient to food, laundry, a store (family dollar) has internet, good location, away from 76 where you can catch you breath!! The only bad thing I would say is the pillows are pancake thin!!! Other than that, it was great!!!

Reviews.Title: “Hated Lakeview Inn”
Reviews.Author: Alan40041
Reviews.Content: Let me say right off the bat that you get what you pay for at the Lakeview Inn. At first glance the room appeared clean. It wasn't until later that we discovered the cock roaches in the bathroom. We also found their crushed remains on the side of the box springs. The beds were very uncomfortable. I can only relate it to sleeping on boards laid across a concrete slab. The first morning I woke up and even my elbows ached. The shower was also a problem. It would not keep a consistent temperature. We were treated to very hot to very cold over and over again. A great way to start the day. The continental breakfast is a joke and isn't worth advertising. On top of all this the location is terrible unless all you plan to do is Silver Dollar City. The strip where most of the shows are located is a long drive. This is especially true with Branson traffic. Please do yourself a favor and avoid the Lakeview Inn. Their motto is it's the best kept secret in Branson. It should stay that way.

Reviews.Title: “Yuck!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This Hotel was in one word disgusting. I very much do not recomend staying here. My family and I had been staying here for probably 10 years, with about four times a year maybe more. We steadily watched it go down hill. Then one night my daughter was getting ready to get into bed and a bloddy bandaid was found on the comforter. That was it. They never gave us enough towels. We have four people in our family and recived three of everything. Also our socks turned black. Yes, this is afforable, but the quality is not worth it. Just stay away from it!

HotelInfo.Name: Lakeview Inn by Silver Dollar City
HotelInfo.Address: Jct. Hwy 76 & Hwy 13, PO Box 2072, Branson West, Branson, MO 65737
